course_details: Master object-oriented programming principles in Python. Learn to create and work with classes and objects.
Comprehensive study of database management systems, SQL, and data modeling. Gain expertise in database design.
Introduction to the C programming language. Cover syntax, data types, and basic control structures.
In-depth exploration of algorithms and data structures. Solve complex problems and analyze algorithmic efficiency.
Learn C++ programming with a focus on object-oriented features. Build advanced software applications.
Adopt industry-standard software engineering practices, including project management and quality assurance.
Develop strong problem-solving skills using algorithmic techniques. Apply algorithms to various domains.
Explore fundamental data structures such as arrays, linked lists, and trees. Master data organization and manipulation.
Get hands-on experience with Amazon Web Services (AWS). Learn to deploy and manage cloud-based applications.
